name: Cave maze 洞窟迷宫
description:
On an unknown continent, there is a cave, rumors that there are many monsters in the cave there are many lovely girls.
Protagonist holding bloodthirsty sword decided to save the trapped cave girls.
Unknown adventure is waiting for the player.

This game is an action and bare game.
The background of this game is to kill monsters in a cave to save the girls.
There are many monsters in the cave and incredible BOSS waiting for the players to solve.
This game is the action game, players need to kill the enemy, to ensure their own immortality.
In the game players will encounter a variety of girls, girls needs the player's salvation.
Every save a girls player's bloodthirsty sword can strengthen +1.
Players need to save the girls, strengthen themselves, while killing monsters.
This game is played to kill monsters, save the girls, strengthen themselves, kill the boss so the cycle.

This game is played monotonous, cautious into the pit！!！If you do not like it can be refunded
This game is for other game funds produced, will be a bit rough, hope understanding!
Cautious into the pit！!！
